projects.title: Stack Overflow clone
projects.desc: This is a Stack Overflow Clone, it offers a familiar yet enhanced Q&A platform for users to interact, post questions, provide answers, and engage through social features like likes and votes.
projects.tech_used: React, Redux, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, Cloudinary, Visual Studio Code, Postman

projects.title: Travel Agency
projects.desc: A platform for users to explore travel packages, book trips, and learn about the agency, combining a user-friendly interface with robust functionalities.
projects.tech_used: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, PHP, MySQL, Swiper.js, Visual Studio Code, XAMPP

projects.title: Admin Dashboard
projects.desc: The Admin Dashboard enhances business operations through a centralized interface, allowing management of products, users, transactions, and sales data. It features real-time data visualizations and advanced data handling capabilities.
projects.tech_used: React, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, MUI, Nivo, Visual Studio Code, Postman

projects.title: BBC-Bakery
projects.desc: Redesigned Bhopal Bakehouse & Cafe website user interface (UI)
projects.tech_used: Visual Studio, HTML5, CSS3, JS, React
